description: Team Key Performance Indicators: definitions, how they are measured, and why they are well-defined. KPIs linked to an experiment_id can be tracked via A/B results (Admin → A/B Experiments).

team_kpis.name: Activation Rate
team_kpis.definition: Percentage of registered users who connect at least one ad account and create at least one dashboard.
team_kpis.why_well_defined: Measures successful onboarding and first value realization; prerequisite for monetization.

team_kpis.name: Time to First Insight
team_kpis.definition: Time from registration to the first meaningful insight (e.g., dashboard creation, widget interaction, or AI analysis).
team_kpis.how_measured: Timestamp difference between registration and the first insight event.
team_kpis.why_well_defined: Directly measures how effectively the product reduces complexity and helps users understand data.

team_kpis.name: Weekly Active Users (WAU)
team_kpis.definition: Number of unique users actively interacting with dashboards each week.
team_kpis.how_measured: Unique users with at least one dashboard interaction per week.
team_kpis.why_well_defined: Indicates sustained engagement and ongoing product value.

team_kpis.name: Dashboard Engagement Rate
team_kpis.definition: Average number of dashboard interactions per active user.
team_kpis.how_measured: Widget additions, filter usage, and reorder actions per session.
team_kpis.why_well_defined: Shows whether dashboards are actively used rather than passively viewed.

team_kpis.name: AI Analysis Usage Rate
team_kpis.definition: Percentage of dashboards analyzed using AI features.
team_kpis.why_well_defined: Evaluates whether AI functionality delivers meaningful value.

team_kpis.name: Upgrade Rate (Free → Paid)
team_kpis.definition: Percentage of active users who convert to a paid plan.
team_kpis.why_well_defined: Measures perceived value and willingness to pay.
team_kpis.note: Primary conversion goal for A/B testing; tracked in Admin → A/B Experiments for pricing_cta_upgrade.

team_kpis.name: Subscriber Retention Rate
team_kpis.definition: Percentage of paid users who remain subscribed over time.
team_kpis.why_well_defined: Indicates long-term value and revenue sustainability.

team_kpis.name: Revenue per Active User (ARPU)
team_kpis.definition: Average revenue generated per active user.
team_kpis.why_well_defined: Connects user engagement directly to monetization outcomes.
